New Records: Victor Wembanyama scored 34 points and grabbed 14 rebounds, both career highs for a single game.
Key Match Events: The Spurs outscored the Kings 56-41 in the second half
Victor Wembanyama made a driving layup with 57 seconds remaining to give the Spurs an 84-71 advantage heading into the final quarter
Pre-Game Insights: Malik Monk, the Kings' stellar sixth man, did not suit up after injuring his right ankle in an OT win at Phoenix on Sunday
Post-Match Reflections: Victor Wembanyama wrapped up his stellar evening with a putback dunk with 58 seconds to play
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Spurs built a five-point edge at the 6:22 mark of the first quarter on a Castle 3-pointer
Sacramento stoked its advantage to nine points early in the second quarter
